mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into refactory (numstr, refpri, refnum, refdate, flag, `operator`, createtime, filed1, filed2, filed3, filed4, filed5 ) values (#{numstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refpri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{refnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update refactory set numstr = #{numstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refpri = #{refpri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, refnum = #{refnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, refdate = #{refdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed3 = #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed4 = #{filed4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed5 = #{filed5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, numstr, refpri, refnum, refdate, flag, `operator`, createtime, filed1, filed2, filed3, filed4, filed5 from refactory where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, numstr, refpri, refnum, refdate, flag, `operator`, createtime, filed1, filed2, filed3, filed4, filed5 from refactory
